law.catch_line: In this section, "bulk vending machine" means a vending machine that:...

text.section:
In this section, "bulk vending machine" means a vending machine that:
contains unsorted merchandise; and
on insertion of a coin, dispenses the unsorted merchandise in approximately equal portions at random and without selection by the customer.
The sales and use tax does not apply to a sale of tangible personal property through a bulk vending machine for a taxable price of 75 cents or less.
